nodes.name: GovernanceDecision

nodes.documentation:
Check if the proposal is expired.
If so, contract would be marked as expired.

	 * exception	PreparingUpgraderException	proposal has not been started.
exception	ReupgradingException	upgrading has been done.
exception	ExpirationException	proposal is expired.
nodes.name: notExpired

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "This function can only be executed by the Governance"

arguments.value: This function can only be executed by the Governance

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "This function can only be executed by the Governance"

nodes.documentation:
Constructor.

	 * @param	_voters	addresses of voters.
@param	_percentage	value of this.percentage.

	 * exception	UninitializationException	_dataAddr does not belong to a deployed Data contract having been initialization.
exception	UpgraderConflictException	another upgrader is working.
exception	InvalidHandlerException	_originalAddr or _newAddr does not belong to a deployed Handler contract.

Start voting.
Upgrader must check if Data contract and 2 Handler contracts are ok.

	 * exception	RestartingException	proposal has been already started.
exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner.
nodes.name: startProposal

nodes.documentation:
Add unique voters.
If expired, self-destruct.

	 * @param	_voters	addresses of voters.

	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner.

see  this.notExpired
nodes.name: addVoters

nodes.documentation:
Vote.
If expired, self-destruct.

	 * @param	_choose	if the voter agrees with the proposal.

	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not a voter.

see  this.notExpired
nodes.name: vote

nodes.documentation:
Set percentage.
If percentage is over 100, it will be fixed automatically.

	 * @param	_percentage	value of this.percentage.

	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner.

see  this.notExpired
nodes.name: setPercentage

nodes.documentation:
Anyone can try to get resolution.
If voters get consensus, upgrade the Handler contract.
If expired, self-destruct.
Otherwise, do nothing.

	 * exception	PreparingUpgraderException	proposal has not been started.

	 * @return	status of proposal.

see  this.notExpired
nodes.name: getResolution

nodes.documentation:
Getter of proposalPeriod.

	 * exception	GetterPermissionException	msg.sender is not permitted to call the getter.

	 * @return	this.proposalPeriod.
nodes.name: getProposalPeriod

nodes.documentation:
Setter of proposalPeriod.

	 * @param	_proposalPeriod	new value of this.proposalPeriod.

	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner.

	 * @return	if this.proposalPeriod is successfully set.
nodes.name: setProposalPeriod

params._voters: addresses of voters. 	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner.  see  this.notExpired

params._percentage: value of this.percentage. 	 * exception	UninitializationException	_dataAddr does not belong to a deployed Data contract having been initialization. exception	UpgraderConflictException	another upgrader is working. exception	InvalidHandlerException	_originalAddr or _newAddr does not belong to a deployed Handler contract.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._percentage: value of this.percentage. 	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner.  see  this.notExpired

params._proposalPeriod: new value of this.proposalPeriod. 	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params._choose: if the voter agrees with the proposal. 	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not a voter.  see  this.notExpired

addVoters(address[]).notice: Add unique voters. If expired, self-destruct.

getProposalPeriod().notice: Getter of proposalPeriod. 	 * exception	GetterPermissionException	msg.sender is not permitted to call the getter.

getResolution().notice: Anyone can try to get resolution. If voters get consensus, upgrade the Handler contract. If expired, self-destruct. Otherwise, do nothing. 	 * exception	PreparingUpgraderException	proposal has not been started.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setPercentage(uint256).notice: Set percentage. If percentage is over 100, it will be fixed automatically.

startProposal().notice: Start voting. Upgrader must check if Data contract and 2 Handler contracts are ok. 	 * exception	RestartingException	proposal has been already started. exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner.

userdoc.notice: The upgrader works in following steps:  1. Call startProposal() to start the voting process;  2. Call getResolution() before the expiration;  3. Upgrade succeed or proposal is expired.   * Function done() can be called at any time to let upgrader destruct itself.   * Function status() can be called at any time to show caller status of the upgrader.
